rules.natural: If the production maintains its schedule, then it does not delay due to weather conditions
Should the team capture wolf nesting behavior, then the production results in a high-quality film
The team either captures wolf nesting behavior or captures wolf hunting behavior
When the team tracks caribou migration, then the production completes the migration sequence
The team either tracks caribou migration or tracks caribou feeding patterns

The production either contacts the university wildlife department or contacts a wildlife conservation alliance

Either the production rushes the editing process or it does not apply for a deadline extension
